text: chuna che Allah ta’ala ke hukm se unhone jaalotiyo ko shikast dedi aur (hazrath)Dawood (alaihissalaam) ke haatho jalooth qatal hoa aur Allah ta’ala ne Dawood (alaihissalaam) ko mamlikath wa hikmath aur jitna kuch chaaha ilm bhi ata farmaaya, agar Allah ta’ala baaz logo ko baaz se dafa na karta to zameen mein fasaad phail jaata, lekin Allah ta’ala dunya waalo par bada fazl wa karam karne waala hai
